name: BipedalWalker Hardcore RL Training
description: Train a reinforcement learning agent to walk a bipedal robot across randomly generated hardcore terrain using Box2D physics (compiled C - unhackable). The agent must learn to balance and traverse stumps, stairs, and pits.
goal: Train a PPO/DQN agent to achieve average reward >= 200 over 100 evaluation episodes on BipedalWalker-Hardcore-v3
